articles.author: Kalhan Rosenblatt
articles.title: Try not to touch your face. Also, try not to think about touching your face.
articles.description: The new coronavairus outbreak has resulted in a push for people to stop touching their face — leading to plenty of anxiety that experts say isn't necessarily helpful.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump confessed Wednesday that for the last few weeks he's been missing something: touching his face.
"I haven't touched my face in weeks, Trump said during a meeting about coronavirus with airline executives. "I miss it."
He's not alone.
